name: Notion Mind Journal
description: Unleash Your Inner Peace and Calm with our FREE Mindfulness Journal Planner. Our template allows you to easily track and monitor your daily mindfulness practices, gratitude journaling, and personal reflections, all in one convenient place. With built-in features such daily affirmations sections and Task & Personal Goals Manager, you'll always have a positive outlook on life. features: Quick Capture; Daily Focus; Mind Journal Section; Personal Goals & Tasks; Resource Management & Tagging System; Journaling AreaFrequently Asked Questions; How to download the template?Once you have made your purchase, you receive a link to the template.
